name: Beezlebullet
description:
Beezlebullet is a creative twist on the bullet hell genre, made in under a week for the Bullet Hell Jam 2021. You play as brave bullet, who tries to destroy Hell by destroying each of the 7 deadly sins. This is our first 3D game!

Credits (Alphabetical Order)

  • Adam Brady - Programming and sound
  • Cian MacNamee - Art and Animation
  • Laura Pennington - Art and Animation
  • Vladimir Dainovski - Programming and Implementation

Special thanks to

  •  Sorkin Type - Limelight font
  • Harpet Studio - Lamp Model
  • Intercido - Wooden Table
  • Holotna - RPG Food & Drinks Pack
  • Paytonwhite - Lipstick Model
